title: Glenn McGrath
summary: Glenn McGrath is a former Australian cricketer who is considered one of the greatest bowlers in cricketing history

value.label: Glenn Donald McGrath
Invalid Date (Age 59)
Dubbo, NSW, Australia
197 cm (6 ft 6 in)
Pigeon
Australian
Bowler
McGrath was regarded as one of the best fast bowlers in the world who relied on accuracy rather than pace.

value.label: Glenn McGrath made his first class debut for New South Wales during the 1992â€“93 season
McGrath's Test debut was against New Zealand at Perth in 1993
The New Zealand national cricket team, nicknamed the Black Caps, played their first Test in 1930 against England in Christchurch, becoming the fifth country to play Test cricket.

image.altText: Image of New Zealand national cricket team

value.label: McGrath was signed by the Delhi DareDevils for the first season of the Indian Premier League in 2008, for a sum of US$350,000.
The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
At the time of his retirement McGrath held the record for most runs scored as a number eleven batsman

image.altText: At the time of his retirement McGrath held the record for most runs scored as a number eleven batsman

value.label: During this career, Glenn McGrath has taken 563 Test wickets

image.altText: During this career, Glenn McGrath has taken 563 Test wickets

value.label: McGrath holds the record for dismissing the most batsmen (104) for ducks in test cricket

image.altText: McGrath holds the record for dismissing the most batsmen (104) for ducks in test cricket

value.label: McGrath has taken the seventh-highest number of one day international wickets (381)

image.altText: McGrath has taken the seventh-highest number of one day international wickets (381)

value.label: Glenn McGrath holds the record for most wickets (71) in the Cricket World Cup.

image.altText: Glenn McGrath holds the record for most wickets (71) in the Cricket World Cup.

value.label: The Australia national cricket team is the joint oldest team in Test cricket history, having played in the first ever Test match in 1877.
The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
The New South Wales cricket team (currently named NSW Blues) are an Australian men's professional first class cricket team based in Sydney.
The Order of Australia is an order of chivalry in 1975 by Queen Elizabeth II, to recognise Australian citizens and other persons for meritorious service.

value.label: The Sport Australia Hall of Fame was established in 1985 to recognise the achievements of Australian sportsmen and sportswomen.

value.label: The ICC Cricket Hall of Fame recognises the achievements of the legends of the game from cricket's long and illustrious history.
